response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is not just an item; it's a gateway to unparalleled experiences and possibilities. Given its significance, I understand that its worth is $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to offer you the chance to own it at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my commitment to ensuring that such a valuable asset remains accessible to those who appreciate its true worth. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your life.", "product_price": 950000}
